html: In DE, 61% of deaths related to overdoses involved fentanyl. I appreciate the Chinese government’s commitment to classify fentanyl as a controlled substance. It is a significant first step & I look forward to seeing our governments work further together to resolve this challenge.

html: It’s hard to believe that the shooting at Columbine High School occurred 20 ago today. In the 20 years since, we’ve failed-plain and simple-to take sufficient action to stop gun violence. On this anniversary, let’s all re-commit to taking real action to prevent gun violence.
text:
It’s hard to believe that the shooting at Columbine High School occurred 20 ago today.

In the 20 years since, we’ve failed-plain and simple-to take sufficient action to stop gun violence. On this anniversary, let’s all re-commit to taking real action to prevent gun violence.

html: This isn’t just about following the letter of the law. It’s also about ensuring that the American people know that nobody in this country – including the President – is above the law.
text: This isn’t just about following the letter of the law. It’s also about ensuring that the American people know that nobody in this country – including the President – is above the law.

html: It is critical that the American people see as much of the evidence as possible to determine for themselves whether they believe President Trump’s conduct was appropriate.
text: It is critical that the American people see as much of the evidence as possible to determine for themselves whether they believe President Trump’s conduct was appropriate.

html: It also shows definitively that President Trump’s actions were, at the very least, completely inappropriate, & far below the standards we should expect from our leaders. It is clear why Special Counsel Mueller felt that he could not clear the President of obstruction of justice.
text: It also shows definitively that President Trump’s actions were, at the very least, completely inappropriate, & far below the standards we should expect from our leaders. It is clear why Special Counsel Mueller felt that he could not clear the President of obstruction of justice.

html: Information in Mueller's report that the President repeatedly attempted to interfere with the investigation—ordering the removal of the Special Counsel, making false statements & encouraging others to lie or conceal evidence of the Trump campaign’s contact with Russia—is alarming
text: Information in Mueller's report that the President repeatedly attempted to interfere with the investigation—ordering the removal of the Special Counsel, making false statements & encouraging others to lie or conceal evidence of the Trump campaign’s contact with Russia—is alarming

html: Since he received the Special Counsel’s 400-page report on March 22, Attorney General Barr has minimized serious concerns about the President’s actions, and has created more confusion rather than providing needed clarity and transparency.
text: Since he received the Special Counsel’s 400-page report on March 22, Attorney General Barr has minimized serious concerns about the President’s actions, and has created more confusion rather than providing needed clarity and transparency.

html: Special Counsel Mueller was charged with investigating important issues: whether the President or his team illegally coordinated with the Russian government during the 2016 campaign and whether they engaged in obstruction of justice.
text: Special Counsel Mueller was charged with investigating important issues: whether the President or his team illegally coordinated with the Russian government during the 2016 campaign and whether they engaged in obstruction of justice.

html: I believe the United States has a responsibility to lead the world in addressing climate change. We also have the OPPORTUNITY to do so in a way that expands economic opportunity and creates American jobs.

html: The impacts of climate change – from extreme weather and drought to rising sea levels – are real, pressing, and will only become more extreme the longer we wait to take meaningful action. It’s time for Congress to act on climate. Now.pic.twitter.com/qX52VUG9LP
text: The impacts of climate change – from extreme weather and drought to rising sea levels – are real, pressing, and will only become more extreme the longer we wait to take meaningful action. It’s time for Congress to act on climate. Now.pic.twitter.com/qX52VUG9LP

html: At the most senior levels, folks in the Trump campaign had a whole series of inappropriate contacts with Russians, and then lied about it. If there was nothing for them to hide, why did they do so much lying and misrepresenting? That question remains unanswered.

html: The Mueller investigation led to 37 indictments and a series of guilty pleas and convictions, including the president's campaign manager, national security advisor, and personal attorney. It's hard for me to see how that is a complete exoneration.

html: The Child Care for Working Families Act would: - ensure no parent has to pay more than they can afford on child care - expand access to quality preschool - invest in child care educators with the training to help our children through their most important stage #ChildCare4Allpic.twitter.com/aXxKJ3S1uN
text:
The Child Care for Working Families Act would:
- ensure no parent has to pay more than they can afford on child care
- expand access to quality preschool 
- invest in child care educators with the training to help our children through their most important stage 

#ChildCare4Allpic.twitter.com/aXxKJ3S1uN

html: The Child Care for Working Families Act would jumpstart our economy by: - creating more than 770,000 child care jobs, - allowing 1.6 million parents go back to work - giving parents the peace of mind that their kids are safe and are being set up for success #ChildCare4Allpic.twitter.com/rSND3ZJwTn
text:
The Child Care for Working Families Act would jumpstart our economy by:
- creating more than 770,000 child care jobs, 
- allowing 1.6 million parents go back to work
- giving parents the peace of mind that their kids are safe and are being set up for success

#ChildCare4Allpic.twitter.com/rSND3ZJwTn

html: That’s why I cosponsored the Child Care for Working Families Act, which will ensure parents have quality child care when they need it, expand access to preschool, and ensure teachers can support themselves and their families. #ChildCare4All

html: I encourage President Trump to press for a complete accounting of all North Korean nuclear sites and facilities during this summit and to work in concert with our allies and international partners to press for verifiable, irreversible denuclearization.
text: I encourage President Trump to press for a complete accounting of all North Korean nuclear sites and facilities during this summit and to work in concert with our allies and international partners to press for verifiable, irreversible denuclearization.

html: Despite President Trump’s claims that North Korea no longer poses a nuclear threat and that Kim Jong Un is an honorable leader, there is no evidence that North Korea has taken any concrete steps to to denuclearize or improve their horrible human rights record.
text: Despite President Trump’s claims that North Korea no longer poses a nuclear threat and that Kim Jong Un is an honorable leader, there is no evidence that North Korea has taken any concrete steps to to denuclearize or improve their horrible human rights record.

html: While I’m pleased to see President Trump pursue diplomacy as he meets with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Hanoi, I remain concerned that President Trump continues to downplay the threat that North Korea presents.
text: While I’m pleased to see President Trump pursue diplomacy as he meets with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Hanoi, I remain concerned that President Trump continues to downplay the threat that North Korea presents.

Since the Parkland shooting one year ago today, almost 1,200 American children have died from gun violence since. 

Let me say that again: almost 1,200 American children.

Thoughts and prayers aren’t enough. 
We need to ACT to stop gun violence. 

We can. 

We must.

This isn’t about politics – people’s lives are at stake.

html: *IF this ruling is upheld* Medicaid expansion would be gone. Free wellness exams and contraception would be gone. The list goes on…
text:
*IF this ruling is upheld* Medicaid expansion would be gone. Free wellness exams and contraception would be gone.

html: *IF this ruling is upheld* protections for the 52 million non-elderly adults with pre-existing conditions would be eliminated.
text: *IF this ruling is upheld* protections for the 52 million non-elderly adults with pre-existing conditions would be eliminated.

html: *IF this ruling is upheld* – which could take more than a year – 17 million Americans would lose their health insurance within the first year alone. Premiums would increase for millions more.
text:
*IF this ruling is upheld* – which could take more than a year – 17 million Americans would lose their health insurance within the first year alone. 

Premiums would increase for millions more.

html: While this plays out in the courts, it’s time for my Republican colleagues to prove they will fight for pre-existing protections, as many of them have recently claimed they want to do.

html: At a time when our farmers are facing challenges from trade tensions, unpredictable weather, and low commodity prices, I am looking forward to seeing this important legislation pass into law and provide needed certainty to Delaware’s farmers.

html: That’s why I voted NO on Bernard McNamee’s nomination to the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission.

html: The transition to clean energy is well underway with the prices for solar and wind energy dropping to all-time lows. The last thing we need is a FERC member who will prop up industries that aren’t economically viable just to serve political interests.
text: The transition to clean energy is well underway with the prices for solar and wind energy dropping to all-time lows. The last thing we need is a FERC member who will prop up industries that aren’t economically viable just to serve political interests.

html: I’m dedicated to fighting climate change and leveling the playing field for clean energy. When he was at DOE, Bernard McNamee supported a proposal that would bail out uneconomical coal plants. This plan was ultimately rejected by the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission.
text: I’m dedicated to fighting climate change and leveling the playing field for clean energy. When he was at DOE, Bernard McNamee supported a proposal that would bail out uneconomical coal plants. This plan was ultimately rejected by the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission.
